--- title: "Regression and Statistical Inference" --- ## Read table and check dimensions ::: {.cell hash='03_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_5cdd34fedeb53ec115c824bbed2f402e'} ```{.r .cell-code} df <- readRDS("./Causal_Data_Science_Data/car_prices.rds") print(dim(df)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 181 22 ``` ::: ::: ## Look at data ::: {.cell hash='03_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e6802b7117c4ac40fbf7d485df359ff7'} ```{.r .cell-code} summary(df) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> aspiration doornumber carbody ````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} glimpse(df) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Rows: 181 #> Columns: 22 #> $ aspiration "std", "std", "std", "std", "std", "std", "std", "std… #> $ doornumber "two", "two", "two", "four", "four", "two", "four", "… #> $ carbody "convertible", "convertible", "hatchback", "sedan", "… #> $ drivewheel "rwd", "rwd", "rwd", "fwd", "4wd", "fwd", "fwd", "fwd… #> $ enginelocation "front", "front", "front", "front", "front", "front",… #> $ wheelbase 88.6, 88.6, 94.5, 99.8, 99.4, 99.8, 105.8, 105.8, 105… #> $ carlength 168.8, 168.8, 171.2, 176.6, 176.6, 177.3, 192.7, 192.… #> $ carwidth 64.1, 64.1, 65.5, 66.2, 66.4, 66.3, 71.4, 71.4, 71.4,… #> $ carheight 48.8, 48.8, 52.4, 54.3, 54.3, 53.1, 55.7, 55.7, 55.9,… #> $ curbweight 2548, 2548, 2823, 2337, 2824, 2507, 2844, 2954, 3086,… #> $ enginetype "dohc", "dohc", "ohcv", "ohc", "ohc", "ohc", "ohc", "… #> $ cylindernumber "four", "four", "six", "four", "five", "five", "five"… #> $ enginesize 130, 130, 152, 109, 136, 136, 136, 136, 131, 131, 108… #> $ fuelsystem "mpfi", "mpfi", "mpfi", "mpfi", "mpfi", "mpfi", "mpfi… #> $ boreratio 3.47, 3.47, 2.68, 3.19, 3.19, 3.19, 3.19, 3.19, 3.13,… #> $ stroke 2.68, 2.68, 3.47, 3.40, 3.40, 3.40, 3.40, 3.40, 3.40,… #> $ compressionratio 9.00, 9.00, 9.00, 10.00, 8.00, 8.50, 8.50, 8.50, 8.30… #> $ horsepower 111, 111, 154, 102, 115, 110, 110, 110, 140, 160, 101… #> $ peakrpm 5000, 5000, 5000, 5500, 5500, 5500, 5500, 5500, 5500,… #> $ citympg 21, 21, 19, 24, 18, 19, 19, 19, 17, 16, 23, 23, 21, 2… #> $ highwaympg 27, 27, 26, 30, 22, 25, 25, 25, 20, 22, 29, 29, 28, 2… #> $ price 13495.00, 16500.00, 16500.00, 13950.00, 17450.00, 152… ``` ::: ::: ## Train linear model ::: {.cell hash='03_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_6e3e4275bb3ed335bbfa9cea0b7707a5'} ```{.r .cell-code} lm_all <- lm(price ~ ., data = df) summary(lm_all) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = price ~ ., data = df) #> #> Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -5662 -1120 0 798 9040 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) -36269.965 15460.866 -2.346 0.020354 * #> aspirationturbo 1846.206 1041.391 1.773 0.078386 . #> doornumbertwo 242.523 571.929 0.424 0.672172 #> carbodyhardtop -3691.743 1424.825 -2.591 0.010561 * #> carbodyhatchback -3344.335 1238.359 -2.701 0.007757 ** #> carbodysedan -2292.820 1356.014 -1.691 0.093043 . #> carbodywagon -3427.921 1490.285 -2.300 0.022885 * #> drivewheelfwd -504.564 1076.623 -0.469 0.640030 #> drivewheelrwd -15.446 1268.070 -0.012 0.990299 #> enginelocationrear 6643.492 2572.275 2.583 0.010806 * #> wheelbase -30.197 92.776 -0.325 0.745294 #> carlength -29.740 51.672 -0.576 0.565824 #> carwidth 731.819 244.533 2.993 0.003258 ** #> carheight 123.195 134.607 0.915 0.361617 #> curbweight 2.612 1.781 1.467 0.144706 #> enginetypedohcv -8541.957 4749.685 -1.798 0.074219 . #> enginetypel 978.748 1786.384 0.548 0.584619 #> enginetypeohc 3345.252 933.001 3.585 0.000461 *** #> enginetypeohcf 972.919 1625.631 0.598 0.550462 #> enginetypeohcv -6222.322 1236.415 -5.033 1.43e-06 *** #> cylindernumberfive -11724.540 3019.192 -3.883 0.000157 *** #> cylindernumberfour -11549.326 3177.177 -3.635 0.000387 *** #> cylindernumbersix -7151.398 2247.230 -3.182 0.001793 ** #> cylindernumberthree -4318.929 4688.833 -0.921 0.358545 #> cylindernumbertwelve -11122.209 4196.494 -2.650 0.008946 ** #> enginesize 125.934 26.541 4.745 5.00e-06 *** #> fuelsystem2bbl 177.136 883.615 0.200 0.841400 #> fuelsystemmfi -3041.018 2576.996 -1.180 0.239934 #> fuelsystemmpfi 359.278 1001.529 0.359 0.720326 #> fuelsystemspdi -2543.890 1363.546 -1.866 0.064140 . #> fuelsystemspfi 514.766 2499.229 0.206 0.837107 #> boreratio -1306.740 1642.221 -0.796 0.427516 #> stroke -4527.137 922.732 -4.906 2.49e-06 *** #> compressionratio -737.901 555.960 -1.327 0.186539 #> horsepower 10.293 22.709 0.453 0.651035 #> peakrpm 2.526 0.634 3.983 0.000108 *** #> citympg -90.352 166.647 -0.542 0.588538 #> highwaympg 154.858 167.148 0.926 0.355761 #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 2189 on 143 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.9415, Adjusted R-squared: 0.9264 #> F-statistic: 62.21 on 37 and 143 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: All parameters with a p-value of less than 0.05 are statistically relevant. ## Regressor example The regressor 'enginesize' takes on continual data ranging from 61 to 326, as can be seen in the glimpse. The slope is 125.934 meaning if we increase the enginesize by 1, the price increases by 125.934. It is statistically relevant because the p-value is 5e-06 which is less than 0.05 (our assumed alpha). ## Adding new variable ::: {.cell hash='03_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_1f0b3ae126213042e561725ea2df9242'} ```{.r .cell-code} df$seat_heating <- TRUE lm_all <- lm(price ~ ., data = df) summary(lm_all) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = price ~ ., data = df) #> #> Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -5662 -1120 0 798 9040 #> #> Coefficients: (1 not defined because of singularities) #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) -36269.965 15460.866 -2.346 0.020354 * #> aspirationturbo 1846.206 1041.391 1.773 0.078386 . #> doornumbertwo 242.523 571.929 0.424 0.672172 #> carbodyhardtop -3691.743 1424.825 -2.591 0.010561 * #> carbodyhatchback -3344.335 1238.359 -2.701 0.007757 ** #> carbodysedan -2292.820 1356.014 -1.691 0.093043 . #> carbodywagon -3427.921 1490.285 -2.300 0.022885 * #> drivewheelfwd -504.564 1076.623 -0.469 0.640030 #> drivewheelrwd -15.446 1268.070 -0.012 0.990299 #> enginelocationrear 6643.492 2572.275 2.583 0.010806 * #> wheelbase -30.197 92.776 -0.325 0.550462 #> enginetypeohcv -6222.322 1236.415 -5.033 1.43e-06 *** #> cylindernumberfive -11724.540 3019.192 -3.883 0.000157 *** #> cylindernumberfour -11549.326 3177.177 -3.635 0.000387 *** #> cylindernumbersix -7151.398 2247.230 -3.182 0.001793 ** #> cylindernumberthree -4318.929 4688.833 -0.921 0.358545 #> cylindernumbertwelve -11122.209 4196.494 -2.650 0.008946 ** #> enginesize 125.934 167.148 0.926 0.355761 #> seat_heatingTRUE NA NA NA NA #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 2189 on 143 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.9415, Adjusted R-squared: 0.9264 #> F-statistic: 62.21 on 37 and 143 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: The model recognized that all observations for this new regressor are the same and therefore do not influence the resulting price. The coefficients are not available (NA) and therefore not included in the model.
